thread.title: 'There is no plan' Emily Thornberry fires at May over 'contradictory' Brexit speech
thread.title_full: 'There is no plan' Emily Thornberry fires at May over 'contradictory' Brexit speech

title: 'There is no plan' Emily Thornberry fires at May over 'contradictory' Brexit speech
text:
'There is no plan' Emily Thornberry fires at May over 'contradictory' Brexit speech 'There is no plan' Emily Thornberry fires at May over 'contradictory' Brexit speech LABOUR MP Emily Thornberry has dismissed Theresa May’s Brexit plan, calling it a “series of aspirations” following her speech on Tuesday. PUBLISHED: 18:10,   18:16, Wed, Jan 18, 2017 
The politician said the Prime Minister “will not able to deliver” with regards to a favourable Brexit deal after insisting Labour was the only opposition that could challenge Mrs May on the terms in which the UK leaves the EU. 
When asked about the Labour Party underperforming in polling figures, Ms Thornberry said it was not set in stone with the Prime Minister’s “so-called plan” set to “unravel”. 
“Let’s see what happens in relation to this so-called plan,” she told Radio 4’s Word at One . “At the moment, Theresa May is getting good press and she’s been able to come out and say ‘I have a plan’– but it unravels. GETTY Emily Thornberry does not believe Theresa May is the person to deliver a successful Brexit Related articles
